text: Unlike those LIBERAL snowflakes I’m not so EASILY TRIGGERED. That’s why I’m so OFFENDED that this COMMERCIAL is telling me to act like a decent human being!!!! What the fuck?! Acting kindly to fellow human beings and treating people with basic respect is for WOMEN!!!! My masculinity is so fragile that an AD TELLING ME TO ACT DECENT AND NOT TO DISRESPECT PEOPLE completely diminishes any sense of manhood I have!

@queen_astro it's not quantum mechanics at all and I don't totally disagree with you. I disagree with the term. I don't believe that the behaviors that an listed as toxically masculine are masculine behaviors at all. This is obviously just my opinion and you can come at me again.
@babycatincarolina LMAO. Yes ignorance that anyone would call someone ignorant because of a satire.
Coated in estrogen? Jesus Christ, I've heard of ignorance, but...

@sticksandstonesamerica You just missed the point. Toxic Masculinity and toxic femininity are just terms to describe disrespectful, awful behaviours. Gillette's target are man, so their ad is about Catcalling, mansplaning, bullying, because that's what "toxic masculinity" means. Seriously, are you incapable of telling the difference between this term and the strong, pure masculinity (standing up for woman, teaching daughters to be strong, teaching their sons that they are no troglodytes, and violence is not the only options, helping weaker ones). It's really not a quantum mechanics, I think.

@queen_astro I become lost in this ad about the same time you became lost in the term toxic masculinity. Just because feminist would like to lump men into one big category doesn't make it a real thing. When I'm around a rapist I don't become a rapist. Same as if I'm around racist, pedophiles, abusers, etc.  I don't magical become one. There are weak willed men, just like there are weak willed women that fall in line and do what there friends do.
Toxic masculinity is toxic. Not masculinity itself. When did you get lost in this ad?
